message.name: ERR_FV_STAGE_ORDER_NOT_SET
message.locale: The appeal process must have at least one stage selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_ITEM_NOT_SET
message.locale: The appeal process must have at least one item for assignment selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_STAGE_REQUIRED
message.locale: The appeal process must have at least one stage.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_PROCESS_START_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The start date for this appeal process has passed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_PROCESS_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This appeal process has already been canceled.
This appeal process has already been cancelled.
